name: MindSpace
signal_source: ADHD research shows users need 'visual, adaptive systems' that help with 'working memory' and executive function challenges
description: Visual workspace for ADHD users that externalizes working memory through spatial organization and visual cues
target_user: Adults with ADHD who struggle with working memory and need visual, spatial tools to manage information and tasks
pain_point_evidence: Research shows ADHD involves 'difficulties with working memory' and users need 'visual systems that don't demand rigid adherence'
core_loop: Use visual cues for memory support
differentiation: Spatial organization vs. linear lists, working memory support vs. simple task management
subscription_fit: Premium includes unlimited workspaces, advanced visual tools, and cloud sync

pricing.trial_strategy: Free basic workspace, premium for unlimited spaces and advanced features
